lead_paragraph: WILKER--Stanley Joel, on July 17, 2016. Beloved husband of Susan. Loving father of Deborah, Caroline, Steven, Jamie, Jonathan and Jeffrey. Cherished grandfather of Nicholas, Katelyn, Shayna, Devin, Shelby, Halle, Ben, David, Jordana, Daniel, Hannah, Callie, Ethan, Noah and Jake. Service 12 Noon today at Riverside Nassau North chapels, 55 North Station Plaza, Great Neck, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WILKER, STANLEY JOEL
